## BindingKey.generate() method

Generate a unique binding key with `uuid`

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static generate<T>(namespace?: string): BindingKey<T>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  namespace | <code>string</code> | Namespace for the binding |

<b>Returns:</b>

`BindingKey<T>`
